channel.title: Comments on: A Paladin Crime Spree

item.title: By: Zubon
item.dc:creator: Zubon
item.description:
I must find a reason to steal this link...
My wife was playing City of Heroes one night and discovered that someone in her group was less than a mile away. No PvP in CoH, though, so he was safe.
item.content:encoded:
I must find a reason to steal this link…

My wife was playing City of Heroes one night and discovered that someone in her group was less than a mile away. No PvP in CoH, though, so he was safe.

item.title: By: Sei
item.dc:creator: Sei
item.description: I just wonder whether this ganker will change his behavior in the future in light of this. I don't know if he should, i just wonder if he'll treat other players better, or at least not gank so much knowing it could have a real effect on others. I do find it downright weird that she knew the guy who was ganking this poor kid's pally.
item.content:encoded: I just wonder whether this ganker will change his behavior in the future in light of this. I don’t know if he should, i just wonder if he’ll treat other players better, or at least not gank so much knowing it could have a real effect on others. I do find it downright weird that she knew the guy who was ganking this poor kid’s pally.

item.title: By: Ninefingers
item.dc:creator: Ninefingers
item.description:
HAHA! That's hilarious! I so have to borrow this from you.
KK
